content.rendered:
Dive into World Creation with Little Alchemy and Little Alchemy 2!

Little Alchemy and Little Alchemy 2 are captivating games that challenge you to build a universe, element by element. By combining basic starting elements, you’ll unlock hundreds of increasingly complex items, from familiar objects like water and fire to fantastical creatures like dragons and unicorns.

Getting Started:

Both games share the core concept of element combination. Here’s a quick rundown:

  1. Starting Elements: You begin with fundamental elements like air, water, earth, and fire.
  2. Drag and Drop: Drag one element onto another to attempt a combination. If successful, a new element appears.
  3. Experimentation is Key! There’s no set path. Try combining different elements to discover new creations.

Little Alchemy vs Little Alchemy 2:

While the core gameplay remains the same, there are a few key differences:

  • Accessibility: Little Alchemy is free to play online, while Little Alchemy 2 is a paid mobile app.
  • Interface: Little Alchemy has a simpler interface for dragging and dropping elements. Little Alchemy 2 offers a toolbar with search functions, saving options, and more.
  • Content: Little Alchemy 2 boasts more elements, dynamic visuals, and an expanded library to explore.

Tips and Tricks:

  • Think logically: Combine elements that seem thematically linked. For example, water and earth might create mud.
  • Pay attention to the encyclopedia: Both games offer descriptions of the elements you create. These descriptions can provide clues for further combinations.
  • Don’t be afraid to revisit old elements: Combining previously created elements can unlock new discoveries.
  • Utilize online resources: For those stuck, there are online guides (like [Little Alchemy Cheats]) that offer complete walkthroughs and element combination recipes.

Beyond the Basics: Little Alchemy 2 Specifics

Little Alchemy 2 offers additional features to enhance your world-building experience:

  • Collections: Organize your creations into themed collections for easier navigation.
  • Search function: Quickly find specific elements within your growing library.
  • Animations: Witness some elements come to life with charming animations.

Ready to Begin?

So, are you ready to craft your own universe? With a little creativity and these helpful tips, you’ll be well on your way to becoming a master alchemist in both Little Alchemy and Little Alchemy 2. Remember, experimentation is key, so have fun and unleash your inner creator!

little alchemy hints

  • Think logically: Combine elements that seem thematically related. Fire + Water = Steam, Earth + Water = Mud, etc.
  • Experiment with existing elements: Once you have a decent number of elements, try combining them in various ways. You might be surprised by the results!
  • Unlock hidden elements: Discovering some elements unlocks new base elements like “Light” or “Time.” These can open up new creation possibilities.

little alchemy recipes

how to make life in little alchemy

  1. Create Energy: Combine Air + Fire.
  2. Make a Swamp: Combine Plant + Mud (made with Earth + Water).
  3. Birth Life: Combine Energy with the Swamp.

how to make human in little alchemy 2

  1. Craft Life: (See instructions above)
  2. Make Ape: Combine Life + Time.
  3. Evolve to People: Combine Ape + Tool.

how to make time in little alchemy

While you can’t directly make time, it’s used in some creations in Little Alchemy, like the Ape mentioned above. Time is generally considered a thematic element, not a physical one in the game.

how to make wood in little alchemy 2

Grow a Tree: Combine Earth + Water. Harvest Wood: The tree element itself represents wood.

how to make tool in little alchemy

  1. Craft Stone: Combine Earth + Fire.
  2. Shape a Tool: Combine Stone with another element depending on the desired tool type. For example, Stone + Fire might create a primitive axe.

how to make animal in little alchemy

Animal/Wild Animal:

In both games:

  1. Grow a Forest: Combine Tree + Tree.
  2. Spark Life: Combine the Forest with Life (refer to previous guide for creating Life).

how to make big in little alchemy

Unfortunately, there isn’t a direct recipe for “big” in Little Alchemy. However, you can use it thematically when combining elements to create larger versions of existing things, like a Giant + Tree might create a Redwood.

how to make philosophy in little alchemy 2

Craft Knowledge: Combine Mind + Book. Explore Ideas: Combine Knowledge with Air.


how to make sand in little alchemy

Create Stone: Combine Earth + Fire. Refine Sand: Combine Stone with Air.

how to make grass in little alchemy 2

Grow a Plant: Combine Earth + Water. Nurture Grass: The base Plant element can represent grass in some contexts.

how to make metal in little alchemy

Extract Ore: Combine Earth + Fire (molten rock can be considered ore). Refine Metal: You can imagine the Ore element to represent refined metal.

how to make flower in little alchemy 2

  • Grow a Plant: Combine Earth + Water.
  • Cultivate Flowers: Combine Plant with something beautiful or colorful, like Sun or Rainbow.

how to make tree in little alchemy

  • Create Mud: Combine Earth + Water.
  • Form a Swamp: Combine Mud + Air.
  • Grow a Tree: Combine the Swamp with a Plant (made with Earth + Earth).

how to make electricity in little alchemy 2

  • Craft Storm: Combine Water + Wind.
  • Harness Electricity: Combine Storm + Metal.

how to make stone in little alchemy

Forge Stone: Combine Earth + Fire.

how to make evil in little alchemy 2

  • Combine Darkness + Mind for a shadowy concept.
  • Combine Fire + Demon (assuming you’ve already created a Demon) for a more destructive force.

how to make cow in little alchemy

  • Create Life: (Refer to previous guides for creating Life)
  • Make Animal: Combine Life + Forest.

how to make godzilla in little alchemy

  • Combine Fire + Lizard for a fiery creature.
  • Combine Large + Animal (thematic combination) for a giant beast.

how to make land in little alchemy

“Land” is often considered a base element or concept in these games, not something you create. Earth and Stone elements can represent land.

how to make small in little alchemy 2

Similar to “big” in Little Alchemy, there isn’t a direct recipe for “small” in Little Alchemy 2. You can use it thematically when combining elements to create miniature versions of existing things. For instance, Miniature + Tree might create a Bonsai tree.

how to make paper in little alchemy

  1. Combine Air + Air.
  2. Craft Wood: Combine Tool + Tree (made with Earth + Water).
  3. Form Paper: Combine Wood with the Pressure.

how to make sun in little alchemy

  • Combine Fire + Light for a radiant element.
  • Combine Star + Energy for a celestial body.

how to make space in little alchemy

There isn’t a specific recipe for “space” in Little Alchemy, but it’s often considered the backdrop for your creations. You can imagine the empty space on the screen to represent space.

how to make cloud in little alchemy 2

  • Create Water Vapor: Combine Water + Heat (Heat can be created with Fire).
  • Form Clouds: Combine Water Vapor with Air.

how to make sky in little alchemy 2

“Sky” is a concept often represented by the background in these games. You can combine elements like Cloud + Air or Sun + Blue to achieve a sky-like feel.

how to make good in little alchemy 2

  • Combine Love + Peace for a harmonious concept.
  • Combine Light + Angel (assuming you’ve already created an Angel) for a benevolent force.

how to make campfire in little alchemy 2

  • Craft Fire: Combine Wood + Spark (Spark can be created with Flint and Steel).
  • Build Campfire: Combine Fire with Stone.


how to make monkey in little alchemy 2

  • Spark Life: (Refer to previous guides for creating Life) Make Animal:
  • Combine Life + Forest. Evolve Monkey:
  • Combine Animal + Tree (thematic combination).

how to make immortality in little alchemy 2

  • Combine Life + Time for a concept of extended life.
  • Combine Phoenix + Ash (assuming you’ve already created a Phoenix) for a creature known for rebirth.

how to make dough in little alchemy

  • Mill Flour: Combine Stone + Wheat (made with Farmer + Plant). Mix Dough:
  • Combine Flour with Water.

how to make lizard in little alchemy

  • Create Life: (Refer to previous guides for creating Life) Make Animal:
  • Combine Life + Forest. Evolve Lizard:
  • Combine Animal + Rock (thematic combination).

how to make fruit in little alchemy 2

  • Grow a Plant: Combine Earth + Water. Nurture Fruit:
  • Combine the Plant with something sweet or colorful, like Sugar or Rainbow.

how to make pandora’s box in little alchemy 2

There isn’t a direct recipe for Pandora’s Box in Little Alchemy 2, but you can create elements that represent it thematically:

  • Combine Box + Curiosity for a container filled with unknown.
  • Combine Evil + Hope (assuming you’ve already created Evil) for a concept of mixed blessing.

how to make star in little alchemy

  • Craft Fire: Combine Wood + Spark (Spark can be created with Flint and Steel).
  • Reach for the Stars: Combine Fire with Space (represented by the empty background).

how to make container in little alchemy 2

There are many elements in Little Alchemy 2 that can function as containers depending on what you want to contain. Here are a few options:

  • Box: A basic container for various items.
  • Jar: Can hold liquids or smaller objects.
  • Basket: Can hold loose items like fruit or flowers.

how to make clay in little alchemy

  • Create Mud: Combine Earth + Water. Form Stone:
  • Combine Earth + Fire. Mold Clay:
  • Combine Mud with the Stone.

how to make milk in little alchemy 2

Little Alchemy doesn’t have a direct recipe for milk, but you can create elements that represent it:

  • Combine Cow + Water (thematic combination, assuming you already created a Cow).
  • Combine White + Liquid for a white, nourishing liquid.

how to make dog in little alchemy

  • Spark Life: (Refer to previous guides for creating Life) Make Animal:
  • Combine Life + Forest. Evolve Dog:
  • Combine Animal with Loyalty (you can imagine Loyalty as a concept).

how to make thread in little alchemy 2

  • Grow a Plant: Combine Earth + Water.
  • Process Plant Fibers: Combine the Plant with a tool like Shears or a concept like Industry.

how to make wild animal in little alchemy 1

  • Grow a Forest: Combine Tree + Tree.
  • Spark Life: Combine the Forest with Life (refer to previous guides for creating Life in Little Alchemy 1).

how to make a tree in little alchemy

  • Create Mud: Combine Earth + Water.
  • Form a Swamp: Combine Mud + Air.
  • Grow a Tree: Combine the Swamp with a Plant (made with Earth + Earth).

how to make metal in little alchemy 2

  1. Extract Ore: Combine Earth + Fire (molten rock can be considered ore).
  2. Refine Metal: Combine Ore with another element depending on the desired metal type. For example, Stone + Fire might create a primitive tool, which can be a thematic representation of refined metal.

how to make fruit in little alchemy

  • Grow a Plant: Combine Earth + Water.
  • Nurture Fruit: Combine the Plant with something sweet or colorful, like Sugar or Rainbow.

how to make moon in little alchemy 2

  1. Reach for the Stars: Combine Rock (or Stone) with Space (represented by the empty background).
  2. Form a Moon: Combine the resulting celestial body (like Asteroid) with Night or Darkness.

how to make immortality in little alchemy

  • Combine Life + Time for a concept of extended life.
  • Combine Phoenix + Ash (assuming you’ve already created a Phoenix) for a creature known for rebirth.

how to make cold in little alchemy 2

  • Bring the Rain: Combine Air + Water.
  • Feel the Chill: Combine Rain with Human.

how to make diamond in little alchemy 2

  • Extract Ore: Combine Earth + Fire (molten rock can be considered ore).
  • Refine Diamond: Combine Ore with Pressure (created by combining Air + Air).

how to make atmosphere in little alchemy 2

  • Combine Air + Cloud for a cloudy atmosphere.
  • Combine Air + Wind for a windy atmosphere.

how to make story in little alchemy 2

  • Combine Knowledge + Imagination for a creative concept.
  • Combine Speech + Time for a narrative unfolding over time.

how to make wheel in little alchemy

  • Combine Wood + Fire to form a primitive tool like a club.
  • Combine the tool with Circle (conceptual) for the idea of a wheel.

how to make god in little alchemy

  • Combine Light + Energy for a powerful force.
  • Combine Life + Universe (conceptual) for a creative force behind existence.

how to make darth vader in little alchemy

  • Combine Fire and Jedi.


how to make deity in little alchemy 2

Little Alchemy 2 doesn’t have a direct “Deity” element.


how to make dinosaur in little alchemy

  1. Combine Reptile and Time (Little Alchemy 1)
  2. Combine Reptile and Egg (Little Alchemy 2)


how to make armor in little alchemy 2

  • Combine Metal and Leather

how to make planet in little alchemy

  • Combine Earth and Space

how to make car in little alchemy 2

  1. Combine Wheel and Engine (Engine: Metal + Fire)
  2. Alternatively, combine Wheel and Horse for a horse-drawn carriage.

how to make star in little alchemy 2

Little Alchemy 2 requires you to unlock “Time” before creating a Star. You’ll need to discover at least 100 elements first. Here’s a streamlined recipe:

  1. Combine Air + Air = Pressure
  2. Combine Earth + Pressure = Stone
  3. Combine Earth + Earth = Land
  4. Combine Land + Land = Continent
  5. Combine Continent + Continent = Planet
  6. Combine Stone + Planet = Moon (Alternatively, Earth + Water = Ocean, Ocean + Sand = Beach, Beach + Stone = Moon)
  7. Unlock “Time” (requires 100+ elements discovered)
  8. Combine Time + Moon = Night
  9. Combine Night + Sky (Sky: Sun + Atmosphere – see below) = Star


how to make night in little alchemy

  1. You can obtain Night using the Star creation method above (steps 7 & 8).
  2. Alternatively, combine Sun + Cloud = Rain. Rain interacts with various elements to create Night. Try Rain with:
    • Land
    • Forest (Tree + Land)
    • Mountain (Earth + Fire)


how to make sword in little alchemy

In Little Alchemy, you can craft a sword by combining two elements:

  1. Blade + Metal

Here’s how you can obtain these elements:

  • Blade:
    • Combine Stone + Metal
  • Metal:
    • Combine Fire + Stone
